text:
="preserve">Petro Petrovych Slobodyan (,; 2 July 1953 – 15 December 2020) was a Soviet-Ukrainian football player and manager. He was born in Sheparivtsi, Kolomyia Raion. He made two appearances for the Soviet Union national football team in 1976.
Slobodyan died on 15 December 2020 at the age of 67.
